sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-chart :option="option" style="height: 400px" />
</template>

<script setup>
	import { ref } from "vue";
	import VChart from "vue-echarts";

	const option = ref({
		title: { text: "三次产业结构占比对比", left: "center" },
		tooltip: { trigger: "axis", axisPointer: { type: "shadow" } },
		legend: { top: 30 },
		xAxis: { type: "category", data: ["中国", "美国"] },
		yAxis: { type: "value", max: 100 },
		series: [
			{
				name: "农业",
				type: "bar",
				stack: "total",
				data: [7.9, 0.9],
				itemStyle: { color: "#FAC858" }
			},
			{
				name: "工业",
				type: "bar",
				stack: "total",
				data: [40.5, 19.1],
				itemStyle: { color: "#EE6666" }
			},
			{
				name: "服务业",
				type: "bar",
				stack: "total",
				data: [51.6, 80.0],
				itemStyle: { color: "#73C0DE" }
			}
		]
	});
</script>
